languages.text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 2 за каждый ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматика{/g}, но понижает значения всех {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g} на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: On use, grants 25 momentum and an additional +25 momentum every turn. Decreases all characteristics by −15 if the character has less than Benevolentia: Adherent conviction.
On use, grants 25 momentum and an additional +25 momentum every turn. Decreases all characteristics by −15 if the character has less than Benevolentia: Adherent conviction.

Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

languages.text: 使用者每有1级{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}信念等级，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}就会提高2点，但所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低10点。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用后获得25点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}额外获得25点士气。如果使用者的信念未到达“人道主义：拥护者”，则所有属性降低15点。
使用者每有1级“自由主义”信念等级，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}就会提高2点，但所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低10点。此效果不可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g}のレベルごとに使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が2増加して、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が−10減少する。効果は蓄積しない。
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用すると{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}25を獲得し、さらに{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}毎に推進力が25増加する。キャラクターがベネボレンティア：門下生の信念以下の場合、全ての能力が15減少する。
戦闘終了まで、革新主義のレベルごとに使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が2増加して、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が−10減少する。効果は蓄積しない。

languages.text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 2 за каждый ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматика{/g}, но понижает значения всех {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g} на 10 до конца боя. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Применение дает 25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} сразу и еще +25 моментума каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Понижает все характеристики персонажа на 15, если он не обладает убеждением Благодеяние ранга "сторонник" или выше.

Применение дает 25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} сразу и еще +25 моментума каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Понижает все характеристики персонажа на 15, если он не обладает убеждением Благодеяние ранга "сторонник" или выше.

languages.text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del usuario en +2 por cada rango de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}, pero reduce todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} en −10 hasta el final del combate. No se acumula.
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Al usarlo, proporciona 25 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} y +25 de ímpetu adicionales cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Reduce todas las características en −15 si el personaje no tiene al menos la convicción Benevolentia: Partidario.

languages.text: Erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Nutzers für jede Stufe von "{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g}" um +2, während alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −10 reduziert werden. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt bei Nutzung 25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} und zusätzlich pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +25 Dynamik. Reduziert alle Eigenschaften um −15, wenn der Charakter weniger hat als die Überzeugung Benevolentia: Anhänger.

languages.text: Augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de l'utilisateur de +2 par niveau d'{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g}, tout en réduisant toutes les autres {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de −10 jusqu'à la fin du combat. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Lors de son utilisation, confère 25 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} et +25 de fougue supplémentaire à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Réduit toutes les caractéristiques de -15 si la conviction du personnage est inférieure à Benevolentia - Partisan.

languages.text: Her bir {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} seviyesi için kullanıcının {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini 2 puan artırırken tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerini{/g} ise 10 puan azaltır. Bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Increases the user's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +2 for each level of {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} while decreasing all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} by −10 until the end of combat. Does not stack.
